name: cappucina-midterm-project
description: This repository contains our Midterm Project for Web Technologies (IT 312). Our project is an app, a "Carpooling App" for SLU Maryheights Campus. The app would be similar to Grab but instead allow students or faculty with cars to allow carpooling while clients can book to be a passenger. The modules will include the Clients (book a ride), Car Owners (providers), Admin (viewing a dashboard and perform user management).
